collectible.title: Miku's Leek
collectible.subtitle: Perfect for doing the Ievan Polka!
collectible.text: "I didn't come with a leek, but I wouldn't mind having one!" Well, now you do!

collectible.title: Triple Baka Card
collectible.subtitle: A secret collectible?! Oh my gosh!
collectible.text: No, there are not 3 people here, but you've got to admit, it is funny. Plus, It's signed, so you know it'll have extra value when you sell it on eBay!

collectible.title: Miku's Tie
collectible.subtitle: Hugely Iconic!
collectible.text: As you get ready to leave the inventory for the evening, Miku comes up to you, and in her hand is her tie. Well... not her real tie. "I usually have a couple spares on hand, and I thought you could take one!" She leaves the tie in your hand, and as she walks off, she waves and says: "I hope we get to play again soon!"
collectible.unlock: Lose a game where Hatsune Miku, at the very least, loses her tie. She doesn't have to win.

collectible.title: Miku's Headset
collectible.subtitle: An Authentic Piece of Idol Memorabilia
collectible.text: Miku tends to keep her headset on almost all the time. However, she tends to keep a spare on hand in case of backup, and thought she'd give it to you as a gift for beating her so swiftly. You're not entirely sure what you'll do with an idol headset, but you reason it could work well as a gaming headset, or something of that matter. The simple fact of the matter is: you have it in your possession, and are now free to brag about it.
